boardgame.name: Hammer of the Scots
boardgame.description: Hammer of the Scots brings the rebellion of the Braveheart, William Wallace, to life. As the English player, you seek to pacify Scotland by controlling all the important noble lords. The Scottish player also seeks the allegiance of nobles to support a difficult struggle for freedom. Hammer of the Scots will give you many hours of entertainment and insight into this fascinating period in history._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Highlights_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Map board: Full-color (22_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; x 25_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;) mapboard of Scotland and Northern England with heraldry of the important noble families._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Wooden Blocks (24mm): 56 Hardwood counters including leaders, nobles, archers, knights, and infantry._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 25 Event Cards_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Detailed Game Rules_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Two Scenarios: A campaign game plus two scenarios: Braveheart and The Bruce._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Playable History: Hammer of the Scots is a very playable game. The rulebook is 8 pages. Games last from 2-4 hours._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes: played just once. blocks are perfect and the board is also. box is near mint. Game is heavy so shipping will be $10.00 US If out of US, shipping will be actual cost plus $3.00 packaging.

_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Assembled_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; (put the stickers on the blocks), but unplayed. Some rulebook wear. Shipping within the US via insured priority mail. Note to International (non-US) buyers: I must declare actual value on all customs forms. **I will not falsify values on customs forms, no exceptions!**. For International orders, only Paypal is accepted.

Played twice. Game is in absolutely perfect condition. All stickers correctly applied to blocks. Special care was taken to apply the most important stickers (Wallace, Edward, Hobelars...) to the blocks with the least distinguishing features, to maintain hidden unit values.

new, 1st edition (current rulebook available from columbiagames.com, otherwise only difference between 1st and 2nd ed. is the dice). I have 2 copies so I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m selling the extra. Shipping is by priority mail. International shipping depends on destination and speed.

Better than new! EXTRAS: 2 color copies of the latest rulebook. 2 color 2-sided play summaries on card stock(based on latest rules). Several reduced-size color copies of the map board on card stock. 1 color _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;battle mat_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;. Game has been played only a few times.
Excellent condition. Played twice.
The map corner has a crease in it and two or three labels wore out. This does not affect play.

1st edition. Some shelf wear to box, all else excellent. Paypal ships ASAP, personal checks or MO must be drawn on a US bank and have to clear first (sorry, been burned before 8^). Shipping via USPS priority usually takes 10 days or so.

Game is in very good condition and verified complete. The stickers have been placed on the blocks. Buyer pays actual shipping.

This is a copy of the first edition game (The artwork on the cards is somewhat different, otherwise same rules and units). I will charge only actual shipping costs (Box, Materials, USPS priority mail w/delivery confirmation).

played several times, but box and contents are still in excellent condition. this was a first edition copy of the game and i have the first edition cards which are in sleeves. i also have a deck of the 2nd edition cards (included when i got crusader rex) which have not been used. shipping cost depends on method and destination (send me a message to get a quote), and please add 3% if paying by paypal with a credit card.
Complete and in very good condition, only played a couple of times, stickers applied and sorted. Paypal only. No credit cards. Pictures available on request

This is a very well kept first edition of the Hammer of the Scots block wargame, upgraded to second edition standards (and therefore easily upgradable to third edition standards by printing the latest version of the rules). I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m selling this because of a lack of space and the fact that I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve recently played other Columbia Games like Richard III and Julius Caesar more. The game is 100% complete and in pristine condition, therefore the like new rating. It comes from a non smoking home and has been very well kept. More images of the game are available on request. Postage _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; packaging: * Netherlands (standard mail) € 7,00 * EU (priority airmail) € 10,00 * World (priority airmail) € 20,00 Payment: * PayPal or bank transfer (bank transfer = Europe only) Please feel free to inquire for other shipping options (e.g. combined shipping or insurance) or any other questions. My rating on BGG is 3 at the moment, but check my nickname on eBay for 500+ positive feedback results.

You pay all shipping charges. For domestic shipping, this game can be shipped inside a medium Priority Mail flat rate box for $11.00. This method also does not include insurance, which can be added for $1.75. I cannot be responsible for lost or damaged shipments if you do not purchase insurance. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll ship by another method if you prefer. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m happy to combine shipping for multiple items. Use zip code 98104 to calculate shipping costs. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m also happy to arrange for local pickup in the Seattle-Tacoma-Olympia area. I will ship anywhere, by your choice of carrier, however there is a $10 surcharge per international shipments above the cost of shipping to compensate me for the additional time involved in shipping internationally. Note that this is per shipment, so if you buy several games from me and have them shipped together, you just pay once. Sorry to have to do this, but international shipments are much more time consuming for me than domestic shipments. Payment by PayPal only, except for local pickup which must be paid in cash. Sorry, no checks or money orders. I will ship within 3 days of receipt of payment.
